channel.title: recommended watch on Rusland 1
channel.description: Recent content in recommended watch on Rusland 1

item.title: Vinyl in Russia (and X-rays in the USSR)
item.description: Trailers The name of this trailer is aptly explained, Рок на костях = rock on the bones. No subtitles, and not very inviting. There’s also a Новый Трейлер (new trailer) and The Needle in my Ribs (an older one). Music history It’s best to watch the entire documentary.
